a: We’re available 7 days a week by appointment. Same-day slots are often open—text or book to check today.
We serve all of Horry County: Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle, Conway, Surfside, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Socastee, Carolina Forest, Little River, Aynor, Loris—and nearby.
Pricing depends on the job. Quick ballpark: standard cleaning starts around $120, mobile detailing from $89. Ask for a fast custom quote.
Mobile Detailing: thorough exterior wash, wheels/tires, windows, interior vacuum/wipe, and add-ons like shampoo and odor treatment. We come to you.
Cleaning Services: standard, deep, move-in/out, and Airbnb turnover. We bring supplies and can accommodate special requests.
We accept cards, cash, and most popular apps. Invoices/receipts provided.
Yes—licensed and insured. Happy to provide documentation upon request.
Ask about first-time client specials and bundle discounts for regular service.
